pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū anācāraṃ ācaritvā “aññāṇakena āpannāti jānantū”ti pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.3: “idāneva kho mayaṃ jānāma, ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.5: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vakkhanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.6: ‘idāneva kho mayaṃ jānāma, ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī’”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.7: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadetha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.8: ‘idāneva kho mayaṃ jānāma, ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī’”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.11: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vakkhatha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.12: ‘idāneva kho mayaṃ jānāma, ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.15: “Yo pana bhikkhu anvaddhamāsaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.16: ‘idāneva kho ahaṃ jānāmi, ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.17: Tañce bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū jāneyyuṃ nisinnapubbaṃ iminā bhikkhunā dvattikkhattuṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne, ko pana vādo bhiyyo, na ca tassa bhikkhuno aññāṇakena mutti atthi, yañca tattha āpattiṃ āpanno tañca yathādhammo kāretabbo, uttari cassa moho āropetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:1.18: ‘tassa te, āvuso, alābhā, tassa te dulladdhaṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne na sādhukaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karosī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.11: “aññāṇakena āpannoti jānantū”ti pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.12: “idāneva kho ahaṃ jānāmi, ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī”ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.13: Tañce mohetukāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū jāneyyuṃ nisinnapubbaṃ iminā bhikkhunā dvattikkhattuṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne, ko pana vādo bhiyyo, na ca tassa bhikkhuno aññāṇakena mutti atthi, yañca tattha āpattiṃ āpanno, tañca yathādhammo kāretabbo, uttari cassa moho āropetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.17: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne na sādhukaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.18: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno mohaṃ āropeyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.21: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne na sādhukaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.23: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno mohassa āropanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc73:2.1.26: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
